elements.name: age
elements.title: What is your age?

elements.name: maritalStatus
elements.title: What is your marital status?

elements.name: occupation
elements.title: What is your occupation?

elements.name: relationshipToChild
elements.title: What is your relationship to the child/children?
options: I am the mother of the child/children
I am the father of the child/children
I am the grandparent of the child/children
I want to adopt the child/children

elements.name: custodyStatus
elements.title: What is the current custody status of the child/children?
options: In my custody or shared custody with my spouse
In the custody of the birth parent(s), other than my spouse

elements.name: biologicalMotherPosition
elements.title: What is the biological mother’s position regarding the adoption?

elements.name: biologicalFatherPosition
elements.title: What is the biological father’s position regarding the adoption?

elements.title: How old is the child/are the children?

elements.title: What is your gross annual income?

elements.name: childAge
elements.title: How old is your child/are your children?

elements.name: relationshipStatus
elements.title: What is the current status of your relationship with the other parent?
options: We live together but are not married
We do not live together and were never married
We are married and live together
We are separated but have not filed for divorce
We are separated, and a divorce case has been filed
We are divorced, and both live alone
We are divorced, and I am remarried
We are divorced, and my ex-spouse is remarried
We are divorced, and both of us are remarried

elements.name: custodyArrangement
elements.title: What is the current custody arrangement for the child/children?
options: They are in my former spouse’s/other parent’s custody

elements.name: visitationArrangement
elements.title: What is the current visitation arrangement?
options: Visits are limited in frequency (per week, month, or year)

elements.title: What is the other parent’s occupation?
